thag3.6:5.1: “One of those monks who live in Pāṭaliputta—
thag3.6:5.2: such brilliant speakers, and very learned—
thag3.6:6.1: One of those monks who live in Pāṭaliputta—
thag3.6:6.2: such brilliant speakers, and very learned—
thag3.6:6.4: an old man, trembling in the wind.”
thag3.6:7.1: “By war well fought, by sacrifice well made,
thag3.6:7.4: that’s how one prospers in happiness.”
